description: Z-scored daily changes in the 2Y Treasury yield (yc_2y_vel_z: Fed policy expectations) and the 10Y-2Y spread (yc_2y10y_vel_z: classic steepener/flattener). Uses the policy-sensitive 2Y anchor vs att2's overnight 3M anchor. 2 features, both velocity-based (daily changes), no level variables.
gate2_expected: UNCERTAIN (2Y is different tenor than att2; some overlap possible)
gate3_expected: UNCERTAIN (2Y policy channel is key for gold; different from att6)
